DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively observe outcomes surgical prolapse treatment term urinary , bowel , sexual function , quality life , patient satisfaction , cost , achieve patient determine treatment goal .
DOC.brief_title: Observing Pelvic Organ Prolapse Symptoms And Treatment Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Patients meet inclusion/exclusion criterion identify review hospital 's surgical boarding list contact phone obtain informed consent . Once informed consent obtain , chart review conduct William Beaumont Hospital physician 's office collect patient information relate prolapse condition . Prior surgery , questionnaire mail complete participant 6 12 month surgery , yearly . Questionnaires assess urinary , bowel , sexual function , patient treatment goal , treatment satisfaction , general health wellbeing . Completion questionnaires voluntary , participant follow manner voluntary withdrawal , exclusionary criterion emerge , death .
DOC.criteria: Female Pelvic Organ Prolapse Able provide inform consent Able complete study assessment , per clinician judgment Age < 21 year Currently pregnant < 6 month postpartum
